meanings.definition: A method of etching a printing plate so that tones similar to watercolor washes can be reproduced.
meanings.sent1: The artist used aquatint to create a beautiful print with soft tones.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to make an aquatint during art class.
meanings.sent3: The aquatint technique made the picture look like it was painted with watercolors!
meanings.sent4: Her use of aquatint transformed the plain plate into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The aquatint method brought out the subtle shades in the artwork.

meanings.definition: A print made using the aquatint method.
meanings.sent1: I bought a lovely aquatint from the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The aquatint hanging on the wall caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The aquatint print added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: The aquatint resembled a delicate watercolor painting.
meanings.sent5: The aquatint displayed intricate details in the image.
